aboutUs.subtitle: Your trusted partner for all your automotive needs in Montréal. We offer professional services with an experienced and passionate team.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At FAHE, we are committed to providing the highest quality automotive services. Our team of certified mechanics uses the most advanced technologies to diagnose and repair your vehicle with precision.
mission.description2: We believe in transparency, honesty and customer satisfaction. Every vehicle that enters our workshop receives the personalized attention it deserves.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to some of the most common questions from our customers.

q1.question: What types of vehicles do you service?
q1.answer: We service all makes and models, including domestic, European, and Asian vehicles.

q2.question: Do you offer a warranty on repairs?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer a warranty on both parts and labor for most repairs. Please ask us for details about your specific service.

q3.question: How can I book an appointment?
q3.answer: You can book an appointment by calling us, using our online contact form, or visiting us in person.

q4.question: How long does a typical service take?
q4.answer: Most routine services are completed the same day. More complex repairs may take longer, and we will always keep you informed.

blog.title: Blog

post1.title: 5 Essential Car Maintenance Tips for Every Driver
post1.summary: Keep your vehicle running smoothly and avoid costly repairs with these five essential maintenance tips. Learn how regular checks can extend your car's life.

post2.title: How to Know When Your Transmission Needs Service
post2.summary: Transmission issues can be tricky. Discover the warning signs that indicate it's time to bring your car in for a professional transmission check.
